ðŸ“– Summary: GGH is a Go-based utility that helps users quickly recall and execute SSH sessions. It allows users to search their SSH history and SSH config file, providing an interactive list of previous sessions and config listings. GGH acts as a wrapper around SSH, streamlining the process of connecting to remote servers.
